title: (x) 'Bistro': dynamic script - probably hand-drawn {Mike Y}
content:
Trying to identify the font of Bistro.  
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017035126im_/http:/typophile.com/files/crazyfox.jpg)

comments.content:
The way those letters fit together (poorly) I guess this is hand-drawn, not a font.

- Mike Yanega
